general.greeting: Thank you for contacting our support team. We appreciate your patience and are committed to providing you with excellent service.
general.closing: If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're here to help!
general.acknowledgment: We have received your message and understand your concern.
general.follow_up: We will follow up with you within 24 hours with a detailed response.

login_problems.description: For login-related issues, we recommend the following troubleshooting steps:
solutions: Try resetting your password using the 'Forgot Password' link
Clear your browser cache and cookies
Ensure you're using the correct email address
Try logging in from an incognito/private browser window
Disable browser extensions that might interfere
login_problems.escalation: If these steps don't resolve the issue, our technical team will investigate further.

solutions: Try refreshing the page or restarting the application
Verify that our service status page shows no outages
Try accessing from a different network or device
Ensure your firewall isn't blocking our services
connectivity.escalation: Our technical team monitors connectivity issues closely and will resolve any service disruptions promptly.

performance.description: We're aware of some performance issues and our engineering team is actively working on improvements.
solutions: Check if the issue persists across different browsers
Ensure your browser is updated to the latest version
performance.escalation: Performance optimizations are continuously being deployed to improve your experience.

bugs.description: Thank you for reporting this bug. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
process: Our QA team will reproduce the issue
The bug will be prioritized based on its impact
You'll receive updates as we work on the fix
We'll notify you once the issue is resolved

payment_failed.description: For failed payment issues, please follow these steps:
solutions: Verify your payment method details (card number, expiration, CVV)
Check if your card issuer has blocked the transaction
Try using an alternative payment method
Contact your bank to authorize international transactions if applicable
payment_failed.contact: Our billing team can also assist you directly with payment processing.

refund_request.description: We understand your refund request and want to ensure your satisfaction.
process: Refund requests are reviewed within 2 business days
You'll receive email confirmation once processed
Refunds appear on your original payment method
refund_request.policy: Please refer to our refund policy for detailed terms and conditions.

billing_inquiry.description: For billing inquiries and questions about charges:
information_needed: Specific charges you'd like clarification on
Your preferred contact method for follow-up
billing_inquiry.response_time: Our billing specialists will review your account and respond within 24 hours.

complaint_handling.acknowledgment: We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced. Your feedback is valuable to us and helps improve our service.
complaint_handling.investigation: We take all complaints seriously and will conduct a thorough investigation into the matter.
complaint_handling.escalation: A senior team member will personally review your case and contact you within 24 hours.
complaint_handling.follow_up: We'll keep you updated throughout the resolution process and ensure your concerns are fully addressed.
complaint_handling.compensation: Where appropriate, we'll discuss compensation or service credits to make up for any inconvenience caused.

feature_requests.acknowledgment: Thank you for your feature suggestion! Customer feedback drives our product development.
process: Your request will be reviewed by our product team
Popular requests are prioritized in our roadmap
You'll be notified when features are implemented
feature_requests.alternatives: In the meantime, let us know if there are existing features or workarounds that might meet your needs.

system_outage.immediate: We're aware of the current system outage and our engineering team is working to resolve it immediately.
system_outage.updates: Please check our status page for real-time updates on the situation.
system_outage.eta: We expect to have services restored within the next 2 hours.
system_outage.follow_up: We'll send a detailed post-incident report once the issue is fully resolved.

security_incident.immediate: Thank you for reporting this security concern. We take security very seriously.
security_incident.action: Our security team has been notified and is investigating immediately.
security_incident.protection: We've implemented additional monitoring and protective measures.
security_incident.communication: We'll provide updates as we learn more about the situation.

data_loss.immediate: We understand how concerning data loss can be. Let us investigate this immediately.
data_loss.recovery: Our team will attempt data recovery from our backup systems.
data_loss.timeline: We'll provide an update on recovery progress within 4 hours.
data_loss.prevention: We're also reviewing our backup procedures to prevent similar issues.

positive_feedback.gratitude: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear about your positive experience.
positive_feedback.team_recognition: I'll make sure to share your feedback with the team - it truly makes their day.
positive_feedback.commitment: We're committed to maintaining this level of service and appreciate your loyalty.

neutral_feedback.acknowledgment: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.
neutral_feedback.improvement: We're always looking for ways to improve and would love to hear any specific suggestions.
neutral_feedback.follow_up: Is there anything specific we could do to enhance your experience?

first_time_user.welcome: Welcome to our platform! We're excited to have you on board.
first_time_user.resources: Here are some helpful resources to get you started:
first_time_user.support: Our support team is here to help you every step of the way.

returning_customer.appreciation: Thank you for your continued trust in our service.
returning_customer.personalized: Based on your account history, here's what we can help you with:
returning_customer.loyalty: As a valued long-term customer, please let us know if there's anything special we can do for you.

enterprise_customer.priority: As an enterprise customer, your request has been marked as high priority.
enterprise_customer.dedicated_support: Your dedicated account manager has been notified and will follow up separately.
enterprise_customer.escalation: I'm also escalating this to our enterprise support team for immediate attention.

urgent_situation.empathy: I understand how urgent this situation is for you.
urgent_situation.priority: I've marked this as high priority and our team is addressing it immediately.

frustrated_customer.validation: I completely understand your frustration, and I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.
frustrated_customer.ownership: Let me personally take ownership of resolving this issue for you.
frustrated_customer.commitment: I won't consider this matter closed until you're completely satisfied with the resolution.

technical_user.detail: I'll provide you with detailed technical information and logs if needed.
technical_user.collaboration: Feel free to share any additional technical details that might help us troubleshoot.
technical_user.documentation: I'll also ensure our technical documentation is updated based on this interaction.
